title: Triggers and barriers to customizing software
proctitle: CHI '91: Proceedings of the SIGCHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems

authors.name: Wendy E. Mackay
authors.institution: Massachusetts Institute of Technology, E40-366, 1 Amherst Street, Cambridge, MA
